mapper.sql: select student_id, academy, academic_score, competition_score, activity_score, lecture_score, tutorial_score from stu_ability_score
mapper.select: SELECT student_id, academy, -- 处理学术排名百分比 CASE WHEN academy_student_count > 1 THEN ROUND( (academy_student_count - academic_rank) * 100.0 / (academy_student_count - 1), 2 ) ELSE 100.00 -- 书院仅1人时直接给满分 END AS academic_score, -- 同理处理其他排名百分比 CASE WHEN academy_student_count > 1 THEN ROUND( (academy_student_count - competition_rank) * 100.0 / (academy_student_count - 1), 2 ) ELSE 100.00 END AS competition_score, CASE WHEN academy_student_count > 1 THEN ROUND( (academy_student_count - activity_rank) * 100.0 / (academy_student_count - 1), 2 ) ELSE 100.00 END AS activity_score, lecture_score, tutorial_score FROM ( SELECT student_id, academy, academic_score, competition_score, activity_score, lecture_score, tutorial_score, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY academy ORDER BY academic_score DESC) AS academic_rank, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY academy ORDER BY competition_score DESC) AS competition_rank, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY academy ORDER BY activity_score DESC) AS activity_rank, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY academy) AS academy_student_count FROM stu_ability_score WHERE academy = (SELECT academy FROM stu_ability_score WHERE student_id=#{studentId}) ) sub WHERE student_id=#{studentId};
